Blacknightmare::

Blacknightmare laughted and said "Try to do it"

And she fired two feather-missiles against Predator

--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Predator:
> 
> 
> 
> Being captured and forced into these fights was not Predator's idea 
of fun.  
> The bounty hunter leapt forward, the missiles impacting near him 
but not 
> close enough, only sending shrapnel into his skidplate.  He cursed, 
raising 
> his grenade launcher.
> 
> "I may not want to be part of this stupid IGL thingy, but that 
doesn't mean I 
> won't splatter your insides against the walls!"
